## AnswersError class

Represents an error

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class AnswersError extends Error 
```
<b>Extends:</b> Error

## Remarks

If the error originates from the Answer API, the code and type property will be present.

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [code?](./answers-headless.answerserror.code.md) |  | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Answers API error code. |
|  [message](./answers-headless.answerserror.message.md) |  | string | The error message. |
|  [type?](./answers-headless.answerserror.type.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Answers API error type. |
